metadata.title: CVE-2022-48521 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenDKIM through 2.10.3, and 2.11.x through2.11.0-Beta2. It fails to keep track of ordinal numbers when removing fakeAuthentication-Results header fields, which allows a remote attacker tocraft an e-mail message with a fake sender address such that programs thatrely on Authentication-Results from OpenDKIM will treat the message ashaving a valid DKIM signature when in fact it has none.

criterions.comment: opendkim package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
